name: Senior DevOps Developer
description:
As a member of this team, you will assist the IT team develop, deploy and support the electronic trading solutions using the RA development framework. You will work collaboratively with our core product development team, always looking for service and product improvements. A strong interest in automating and modernizing process is essential.

What makes you relevant for the role?

  • Knowledge of software engineering processes architecture, design patterns, principles
  • Developer experience of at least 3 years
  • Ability to design and implement pipelines for Java, Typescript and Csharp
  • Knowledge of bash scripting
  • Advanced Git skills, knowledge of git development strategies
  • Advanced knowledge of CI tools like Github Actions, Azure pipelines, and ideally Gitlab CI
  • Design and implement cloud architecture in Azure cloud or AWS
  • Be able to use and configure containers, docker, K8s
  • GitOps tools like Helm, Kustomize, Flux, ArgoCD, Terraform
  • Nice to have knowledge
    • LXC/LXD
    • Jenkins
    • Ansible
    • Postgres
    • Powershell Scripting
    • OpenAPI (Swagger)
    • OpenTelemetry
    • Vagrant
    • Serf

What an interview process would look like?

  • Initial Interview with Acamar representative followed by an online test and task
  • Technical interview with Acamar representative
  • Interviews with our client representative
  • When you are successful – welcome on board, and we will take care of the rest!
